document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2015-02
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING CHAPTER 15.12 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE (TRAFFIC IMPACT MITIGATION FEES) TO PROVIDE FOR FUTURE INCREASES OF TRAFFIC IMPACT FEES TO BE ADOPTED ANNUALLY BY RESOLUTION OF THE CITY COUNCIL
